TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Our image cropper tool crops the images by retaining its quality.
None of your data is sent on our servers all the operations are done on the browser itself. This enables us to be 100% safe for our users
Our image cropper tool works on almost all kinds of browsers and devices.
Our image cropper tool is very easy to understand no professional is needed to work on our tool.
Our image cropper tool is completely free of cost, you can use all our tools without paying a single penny
Our image cropper tool is completely browser based and no additional software is required to be downloaded on your device.

FAQ.question: Will my file be saved after I complete working on the image cropper tool?
FAQ.answer: No, we do not send any of your files to our servers all the operations are done on the browser itself therefore all your files are completely safe.

FAQ.question: Do I have to do any additional signup or pay extra to use the image cropper tool?
FAQ.answer: Absolutely not, our tool is completely online and does not require you to share any of your personal information with us, like email id, passwords etc. Our tool is completely free of cost.
